channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Benchmark raises $225M in special funds to double down on Cerebras
item.description: Benchmark Capital has been an investor in the Nvidia rival since 2016.

item.title: ‘We've only scratched the surface on what we can do’: how the NFL and AWS are working together to make the sport safer than ever
item.description: With Super Bowl LX on the horizon, we speak to the NFL on how tech is making the sport safer for players everywhere.

item.title: Have your say: tell me what you want from the Samsung Galaxy S26
item.description: I want to know what'll get you hyped about the Samsung Galaxy S26 again.
